name: 安德里亚·罗斯 Andrea Roth
intro: Andrea Roth (born September 30, 1967) is a Canadian actress. She is perhaps best known for her roles as Janet Gavin, the wife of main character Tommy Gavin, on the FX television series Rescue Me (2004–2011), as Victoria Chase in The Collector (2009), and before that, as Diana Powers/NeuroBrain in RoboCop: The Series (1994).
birthplace: 加拿大,安大略省,伍德斯托克
